techmeme.title: A US judge rules Anthropic's use of copyrighted books to train AI was fair use, but its storage of pirated books in a central library used for training was not (Olivia Sophie Rafferty/ai fray)
Amazon says it plans to bring same-day or next-day delivery to "tens of millions" of people who live "in more than 4,000" smaller US towns by the end of 2026 (Andrew J. Hawkins/The Verge)
Sources: Microsoft is planning a round of Xbox layoffs next week, with managers expecting substantial cuts, the fourth big layoff at Xbox in the past 18 months (Jason Schreier/Bloomberg)
Eventual, which develops Daft, a Python-native open-source data processing engine, raised a $7.5M seed led by CRV and a $20M Series A led by Felicis (Rebecca Szkutak/TechCrunch)
Microsoft and Meta unveil the $399 Meta Quest 3S Xbox Edition, a bundle with the $299 Meta Quest 3S in a new color, available in "extremely limited" quantities (Jez Corden/Windows Central)
